biotools.summary:
A cloud-based data analysis framework for large-scale single-cell and single-nucleus RNA-seq.

Cumulus WDL workflows and Dockerfiles.

Interactive single cell visualization in the cloud or on your desktop.

Cumulus WDL workflows and Dockerfiles — Cumulus documentation.

Clone the cirrocumulus repository:.

Google Cloud Platform (GCP) Deployment Instructions.
